solution_line_template: The ${check_value} check is worth 1/{fraction_denominator} of Yasmin's new balance, so her new balance is {check_value} * {fraction_denominator} = $<<{check_value}*{fraction_denominator}={new_balance}>>{new_balance}.
Thus, Yasmin had {new_balance} - {check_value} = $<<{new_balance}-{check_value}={balance_before_check}>>{balance_before_check} in her account before she deposited the check.
